title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Property Services (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Property Services (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 August 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited property service (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 august 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

(2) References to the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department housing local government heritage (2) reference department justice home affair migration contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department housing local government heritage

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration by or under the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 (No. 40 of 
2011) are transferred to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage. 

(2) References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, on and after the commencement of 
this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister justice home affair migration property service (regulation) act 2011 (no 40 2011) transferred minister housing local government heritage (2) reference minister justice home affair migration contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister housing local government heritage

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions transferred 
by this Order to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage, the 
name of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage shall, in so 
far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be 
substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs 
and Migration or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the 
proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister justice home affair migration party proceeding reference function transferred order minister housing local government heritage name minister housing local government heritage shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister justice home affair migration added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration may, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [392] 3 

in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage, be carried on or completed on or after 
such commencement by the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister justice home affair migration may notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th july 2025 392 3 far relates function transferred order minister housing local government heritage carried completed commencement minister housing local government heritage

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have effect on 
and after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister 
for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister housing local government heritage

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration 
contained in the memorandum and articles of association of any company and 
relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, on and after the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
text_norm: 7 reference minister justice home affair migration contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister housing local government heritage

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred on the commencement to the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, 
transfer or assignment – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage by this Article which, on the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Justice, Home Affairs and Migration shall, on the request of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage, be transferred into the name of the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [392] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
